Articles.Content:
Hello,

I need help with developing my plugin. I need to do some deinitialization routines. But at which point can I put them? I didn't find any method that is called when a flight is ended, KSP is going to close, or my Vessel is onloaded. Are there such methods or is there any other way to perform some deinitialization routines?

Tanks in advance!
You can implement OnApplicationQuit to your MonoBehaviour, then you'll get a chance to do stuff when KSP is closing.

You can implement OnApplicationQuit to your MonoBehaviour, then you'll get a chance to do stuff when KSP is closing.

OK thank you! I will have a look at MonoBehaviour

OK thank you! I will have a look at MonoBehaviour

PartModule is a subclass of MonoBehaviour, so anything that applies there can be used for PartModule derivatives (and ScenarioModule ones).
